name: Blend In (JafCraze)
description:
Copy what the workers wear to avoid suspicion

A/D or Left/Right - select item of clothing
Space - alternate colour of item between red, green and blue

Made in 2:50 hours for Trijam #76
Theme: Imposter
Optional challenge: Used asset from Asset Jam
Music: Aproaching the Summit - Loop.wav by SpikyAndrew for Asset Jam 13
Everything else: Me

Feedback welcome
Let me know if you beat 42.55s!
